wikipedia_page.main: George Klewitz Soward (27 August 1857 – 21 February 1941) was an architect and politician in South Australia.

response: *Charles Atkins Hornabrook JP (c. 1833 – 26 August 1903) married Eliza Maria Soward (c. 1838 – 26 January 1901) on 18 March 1857. Eliza was a daughter of George Soward (1809 – 16 January 1894) and the elder sister of architect George Klewitz Soward, who designed their residence.
:*George Soward Hornabrook (c. 1863 – 29 November 1892) died at Southern Cross, Western Australia
